footer_description: “Eco-friendly Sleeping Products” is a company that has been manufacturing cotton fabrics for use worldwide for many years.
about_paragraph_1: Our company, which produces fabrics and eco-friendly bags, has been supplying cotton fabrics to the global market for many years.
about_paragraph_2: Our company started its operations 17 years ago and during this time has gained the trust of our customers.
about_paragraph_3: Our main goal is to create high-quality, durable, and environmentally safe products.
about_paragraph_4: Our production processes are fully compliant with environmental standards and are aimed at preventing harm to the environment.
about_paragraph_5: We have the ability to produce various cotton products of high quality using modern technologies.
about_paragraph_6: We are also the official representative of DongJu weaving equipment in Uzbekistan.
about_paragraph_7: Every year, over 80 types of products are produced at our factory, ensuring high quality and stable production.
about_paragraph_8: Our company operates over 50 weaving machines based on modern technologies.
about_paragraph_9: In our production processes, we aim to produce only high-quality and environmentally safe products.
about_paragraph_10: We have established the production of eco-friendly bags with modern designs that meet our customers' needs.
about_paragraph_11: Our company is always happy to provide its customers with quality products and high-level service.
